Question A.text: What is the difference between sum of products and a canonical sum of products expressions?

Question B.text: What is the difference between sum of products and product of sums expression?

Question C.text: Does minimal sum of products expression always result in smallest number of logic gates? Why or why not?

Question D.text: What is an universal gate? Is NAND, NOR, or XOR (or more than one of them) an universal gate?
